channel.title: Eco or Spawn?
channel.description:
Hello,
So I was thinking I am really in the mood to write some java, I am thinking of making a new Server I have $100 to get it up and running. I just can't decide what type of server I should make.
So this is my question should I make an Eco server using Vistex V1 fix all the bugs and host it. Or make a pk server spawn using Vistex V7 I want to know your guys opinions on which one would be more succesfull. I will code on it for about 3 weeks before I release. Post your guys ideas of which one I should make and how can I make these servers better.
Looking forward to your guys opinions.

item.title: Eco or Spawn?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

If you have to program in an economy, you’re doing it wrong. An economy is something that should be… manifested by the players, and their actions. The most you should have to do is change the drop tables if things get a little out of hand (for example, KQ dropping a dragon med helm after every fight or something), or if there’s a dupe, and players get loads of high valued items. In that case, you should have a log file of all action, and trace back who did the dupe the most, etc

Read full topic

item.title: Eco or Spawn?
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Agent Jugz, post:10, topic:466648”]economy. pking server’s tend to not last very long, where as economy do (if it’s well maintained and they’re aren’t any flaws).[/quote]there*

item.title: Eco or Spawn?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Economy. I will never play a PK server unless it’s like CheezScape Update 78.

Read full topic

item.title: Eco or Spawn?
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

I’d say Eco if you want a slower building constant player base, where the players stay for a longer amount of time compared to a pk server. On Pk servers players come and go quickly, but you will have more players at certain points. It’s really your decision.

Read full topic

item.title: Eco or Spawn?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

ClairtyX:

Thanks for the advice

You’re welcome. Feel free to post ideas/thoughts. We’ll give our input on them.

Read full topic

item.title: Eco or Spawn?
item.dc:creator: @ClairtyX ClairtyX
item.description:
@ClairtyX wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:3, topic:466648”][quote author=ClairtyX link=topic=583567.msg4154647#msg4154647 date=1352610516]
I will code on it for about 3 weeks before I release.
[/quote]

Should be at least 3 Months.

Post your guys ideas of which one I should make

I’d go with an Economy based Private Server. Everyone has had their chance to Spawn their Items and P.K. with them. The magic in that idea is over, even though they will still remain very much alive and active.

Post your guys ideas of which one I should make and how can I make these servers better.

Actually program content and implement features that people will get excited about. Nobody is going to want to play when all that’s been done is N.P.C. Spawning and Shop editing. Especially with the EXACT same features as It’s Base counterpart.[/quote]

Thanks for the advice I am probably going to go for an eco. I just need some ideas like what people want.

Read full topic

item.title: Eco or Spawn?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

ClairtyX:

I will code on it for about 3 weeks before I release.

Should be at least 3 Months.

Post your guys ideas of which one I should make

I’d go with an Economy based Private Server. Everyone has had their chance to Spawn their Items and P.K. with them. The magic in that idea is over, even though they will still remain very much alive and active.

Post your guys ideas of which one I should make and how can I make these servers better.

Actually program content and implement features that people will get excited about. Nobody is going to want to play when all that’s been done is N.P.C. Spawning and Shop editing. Especially with the EXACT same features as It’s Base counterpart.

Read full topic
